::Shadow Wing::

She called out again, but she felt the connection dissappear.  She no 
longer could communicate with Veratis.  She felt her spark fall as 
she could only hear her own thoughts.  She wished she could talk to 
Lunarpine and tell him how much she loved him and that she was sorry 
for all she had put him through. She would have to wait and see if 
the Matrix would let her live long enough to say these thing to him.

Veratis had started her thinking about things.  How old was he 
exactly? What could he teach her? Woud he be willing to teach her? If 
he had lived and survived this long, perhaps there was the chance 
that her and Lunarpine would make it that long.  She would have 
smiled if she could have.  She felt some small bit of hope and 
thought about the questions she would ask when Veratis returned.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Veratis wanted to stay and chat with Shadow Wing for a while, he to 
had
> questions that he wanted to ask, unfortunately his old body wasn't 
what it
> used to be. "I'm sorry child, I grow tired at my old age, I need 
time to
> rest, Lunarpine will be back in a while and we'll sit and talk face 
to face.
> Until then I must be going." He removed the receptors and placed 
them back
> in thier cases.
